item.description:
In honor of the original Boston Tea Party and in support of the Code Red Rally we will be holding a demonstration against the HC Reform bill.


Wednesday, December 16th, 5:00 – 7:00 PM


If you can attend at either of these offices, please do so- we need to have a large presence. We will meet in front of the JFK Federal Bldg. If there are enough of us, we will split into two groups. In lieu of candles, please bring a flashlight - and a sign if you can. I thought we might carol, as it is the season. So below are some “enhanced arrangements” that I think will garner us some attention. Please dress very warmly – temperature will be below freezing!

Sen. Kerry, One Bowdoin Street, Boston, MA 02203

Sen. Kirk, John F. Kennedy Fed Bldg., 15 New Sudbury Street, Boston, MA 02203
item.name: HC Reform Bill Demonstration
